languages.text: The Arbitrator gains {g|f:e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}Swift Justice{/g} and the ability to use {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Double Slug{/g}, {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Fulmenary Shot{/g}, and {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Flechette Shot{/g} with shotguns.

traits.locale_text: The Arbitrator gains {g|f:e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}Swift Justice{/g} and the ability to use {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Double Slug{/g}, {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Fulmenary Shot{/g}, and {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Flechette Shot{/g} with shotguns.

languages.text: The Arbitrator gains the {g|f:e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}Swift Justice{/g} ability and can use {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Fulminating Shot{/g} with shotguns. In addition, they can select the {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Double Slug{/g} and {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Grisly Adjudication{/g} shotgun attacks through progression.
languages.original_text: Арбитр получает способность {g|f:e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}Быстрое правосудие{/g} и может применять атаку дробовика {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Молниеносный выстрел{/g}. Также по мере развития он может выбрать атаки дробовика {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Двойной выстрел{/g} и {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Суровый вердикт{/g}.

Также по мере развития он может выбрать атаки дробовика {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Двойной выстрел{/g} и {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Суровый вердикт{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Arbitrator gains the {g|f:e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}Swift Justice{/g} ability and can use {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Fulminating Shot{/g} with shotguns. In addition, they can select the {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Double Slug{/g} and {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Grisly Adjudication{/g} shotgun attacks through progression.

traits.locale_text: Арбитр получает способность {g|f:e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}Быстрое правосудие{/g} и может применять атаку дробовика {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Молниеносный выстрел{/g}. Также по мере развития он может выбрать атаки дробовика {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Двойной выстрел{/g} и {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Суровый вердикт{/g}.

Арбитр получает способность {g|f:e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}Быстрое правосудие{/g} и может применять атаку дробовика {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Молниеносный выстрел{/g}. Также по мере развития он может выбрать атаки дробовика {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Двойной выстрел{/g} и {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Суровый вердикт{/g}.

languages.text: Yargıcı, {g|f:e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}Tez Adalet{/g} kabiliyetini kazanır ve pompalılarla {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Şimşek Gibi Atış{/g} yapabilir. Ayrıca ilerledikçe {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Çifte Mıh{/g} ve {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Zımbalayan Karar{/g} pompalı saldırılarını seçebilir hâle gelir.
languages.original_text: The Arbitrator gains the {g|f:e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}Swift Justice{/g} ability and can use {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Fulminating Shot{/g} with shotguns. In addition, they can select the {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Double Slug{/g} and {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Grisly Adjudication{/g} shotgun attacks through progression.

traits.locale_text: Yargıcı, {g|f:e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}Tez Adalet{/g} kabiliyetini kazanır ve pompalılarla {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Şimşek Gibi Atış{/g} yapabilir. Ayrıca ilerledikçe {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Çifte Mıh{/g} ve {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Zımbalayan Karar{/g} pompalı saldırılarını seçebilir hâle gelir.

languages.text:
El Arbitrator gana la capacidad {g|f:e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}Justicia sumaria{/g} y puede usar {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Disparo fulminante{/g} con escopetas. Además, puede elegir los ataques de escopeta {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Cartucho doble{/g} y
{g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Dictamen sangriento{/g} durante su progresión.
languages.original_text: The Arbitrator gains the {g|f:e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}Swift Justice{/g} ability and can use {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Fulminating Shot{/g} with shotguns. In addition, they can select the {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Double Slug{/g} and {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Grisly Adjudication{/g} shotgun attacks through progression.

traits.locale_text:
El Arbitrator gana la capacidad {g|f:e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}Justicia sumaria{/g} y puede usar {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Disparo fulminante{/g} con escopetas. Además, puede elegir los ataques de escopeta {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Cartucho doble{/g} y
{g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Dictamen sangriento{/g} durante su progresión.

languages.text:
法务官获得{g|f:e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}就地正法{/g}能力，使用霰弹枪时可以使用{g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}爆发射击{/g}能力。除此之外，随着后续升级，法务官还可以选择学习{g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}双重火力{/g}与
{g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}严酷审判{/g}这两种霰弹枪攻击能力。
languages.original_text: The Arbitrator gains the {g|f:e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}Swift Justice{/g} ability and can use {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Fulminating Shot{/g} with shotguns. In addition, they can select the {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Double Slug{/g} and {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Grisly Adjudication{/g} shotgun attacks through progression.

traits.locale_text:
法务官获得{g|f:e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}就地正法{/g}能力，使用霰弹枪时可以使用{g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}爆发射击{/g}能力。除此之外，随着后续升级，法务官还可以选择学习{g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}双重火力{/g}与
{g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}严酷审判{/g}这两种霰弹枪攻击能力。

languages.text:
L'arbitrator obtient la capacité {g|f:e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}Justice expéditive{/g} et peut utiliser {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Tir de condamnation{/g} avec les fusils à pompe. Ceci lui permet également de sélectionner les attaques au fusil à pompe
{g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Double cartouche{/g} et {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Verdict sinistre{/g} au fil de sa progression.
languages.original_text: The Arbitrator gains the {g|f:e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}Swift Justice{/g} ability and can use {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Fulminating Shot{/g} with shotguns. In addition, they can select the {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Double Slug{/g} and {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Grisly Adjudication{/g} shotgun attacks through progression.

traits.locale_text:
L'arbitrator obtient la capacité {g|f:e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}Justice expéditive{/g} et peut utiliser {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Tir de condamnation{/g} avec les fusils à pompe. Ceci lui permet également de sélectionner les attaques au fusil à pompe
{g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Double cartouche{/g} et {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Verdict sinistre{/g} au fil de sa progression.

languages.text: アービトレイターは、{g|f:e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}迅速な正義{/g}のアビリティを付与され、ショットガンで{g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}爆鳴性のショット{/g}を使用できる。さらに、アービトレイターは進行に応じて{g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}二重の銃弾{/g}および{g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}不気味な判決{/g}のショットガン攻撃を選択できる。
languages.original_text: The Arbitrator gains the {g|f:e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}Swift Justice{/g} ability and can use {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Fulminating Shot{/g} with shotguns. In addition, they can select the {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Double Slug{/g} and {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Grisly Adjudication{/g} shotgun attacks through progression.

traits.locale_text: アービトレイターは、{g|f:e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}迅速な正義{/g}のアビリティを付与され、ショットガンで{g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}爆鳴性のショット{/g}を使用できる。さらに、アービトレイターは進行に応じて{g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}二重の銃弾{/g}および{g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}不気味な判決{/g}のショットガン攻撃を選択できる。

languages.text:
Der Arbitrator erhält die Fähigkeit {g|f:e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}Schnelle Gerechtigkeit{/g} und kann mit Schrotflinten {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Donnernder Schuss{/g} einsetzen. Außerdem kann er mittels Fortschritt die Schrotflinten-Angriffe {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Doppelpatrone{/g} und
{g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Entsetzliche Anordnung{/g} einsetzen.
languages.original_text: The Arbitrator gains the {g|f:e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}Swift Justice{/g} ability and can use {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Fulminating Shot{/g} with shotguns. In addition, they can select the {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Double Slug{/g} and {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Grisly Adjudication{/g} shotgun attacks through progression.

traits.locale_text:
Der Arbitrator erhält die Fähigkeit {g|f:e9fc0a90ebe8458a86c9b7db9f6770b3}Schnelle Gerechtigkeit{/g} und kann mit Schrotflinten {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Donnernder Schuss{/g} einsetzen. Außerdem kann er mittels Fortschritt die Schrotflinten-Angriffe {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Doppelpatrone{/g} und
{g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Entsetzliche Anordnung{/g} einsetzen.
